mainText:
It's amazing yet crazy to think that I'm typing this email on an invention
by the man himself. I remember I got my first MacBook and absolutely could
not return to a PC. He's an inspiration for future businessmen and women,
future inventors and everyone. May he rest in piece.

Thank you Steve Jobs for this black illuminated keyboard, my anti-glare
screen and the quality Apple provides.
author: Erick
